dropzone.dragAndDrop: Drag and drop your file here

actions.uploadFile: Upload document file. Supports DOCX and PDF files up to 10MB

errors.invalidFileType: Only DOCX and PDF files are supported.
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
errors.parsingError: Failed to parse the file. Please ensure it contains valid questions.
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to import questions. Please log in as a teacher.
errors.forbidden: You do not have permission to import questions to this assignment.
errors.notFound: Assignment not found. It may have been deleted.
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
errors.unknownError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

errorBoundary.title: Something went wrong
errorBoundary.message: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
errorBoundary.modalMessage: An unexpected error occurred while importing questions. Please close this dialog and try again.
